sections.purpose: To measure and control time intervals accurately during experiments.
procedure: Set the desired countdown or count-up time using the control buttons.
Start the timer at the beginning of the procedure.
Respond to the alarm or signal at the end of the timing period.
Reset the timer before the next use.
Record critical time points in the experimental sheet.
precautions: Verify that the timer is set to the correct mode.
Avoid exposing the device to liquids.
Use multiple synchronized timers for complex protocols.
